titleStmt.title: A letter from a person of honour, reconciling the dissenting brethren, (commonly called Independents) and the Presbyterians, in matter of judgement, about the setling of the church. Sent to an eminent divine of the Assembly.
titleStmt.author: Person of honour.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Thomason annotation: the 5 in the imprint date is crossed out and altered to 1644; "Decemb: 30th".
